title: orb.church
caption: Calculates a user's astrological chart using a custom implementation of the Swiss Ephemeris, and then generates a poem based upon the user's placements, using lines written by nationally renowned poet Dylan Krieger. Each poem gets a unique, algorithmically-generated selection of illustrations by Chris Payne, with custom layouts for each possible combination.

title: Slemco.com
caption: Informational site for a local power cooperative using a highly customized Wordpress theme as specified by the client. Built on the WPBakery/Visual Composer plugin.

title: selectbuttons
caption: CSS select buttons. Updated sporadically. Sister site to selectbutton.net

title: jamestancill.com
caption: Portfolio site built on a customized wordpress theme
